CA.name: Sketch Wars
CA.description: We have created Sketch Wars for the causal gamer with family and/or friends that loves to draw and guess. We have added a competitive edge to it so that things will get very interesting. Above all, we hope you have fun with our upcoming title. Sketch Wars has two modes: Single Player Mode Multiplayer Mode Single Player mode offers a chance for you to pick categories and draw with your Wii U™ stylus to practice up for your next party or tournament. Multiplayer Mode offers two styles of multiplayer Singles Play Tournament Play Singles Play is a 1-5 round game where there are up to 5 players (4 Wii Remotes™ and 1 Wii U™ GamePad can play. The player with the Wii U™ GamePad is the designated artist and the others with the Wii Remotes™ must buzz in and select from a list of words what it the artist has drawn.
